# Additional Resources {-#additionalresources}

Coursera is an online training resource that can be an option for additional learning. Some suggested courses include:

* Python for Everybody ([https://www.coursera.org/specializations/python](https://www.coursera.org/specializations/python))
* Bayesian Statistics ([https://www.coursera.org/learn/bayesian-statistics](https://www.coursera.org/learn/bayesian-statistics))
